Author: Cybertron187
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: But there do exist web based centralized and decentralized exchanges to exchange blockchain coins and eventually tokens ? Why would someone use Token Changer then ?

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Currently both exchange types support transactions having two attributes: quantity and price. But buying, selling, giving or receiving value is more complicated than this. In financial services, there are hundreds of trading protocols having a multiplicity of transaction attributes. For example, an options contract has three attributes: quantity, price and time. Buyers and sellers of an options contract need to open and close their position within a predetermined time. The same applies to various industrial sectors. Imagine a platform that can handle simple transactions like the trading of tokens and money remittance as well as complex transactions like futures contracts, debt securitization and invoice discounting.

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Periodically, the will exchange TOC tokens for Block Points. This action will reduce the reserve of TOC tokens available to fund market maker rewards. To maintain the market maker reserve, the team will use Ether revenue to buy TOC tokens from token holders at above market price. Token buyback ensures the customer loyalty program is sustainable and the buyback price acts as a mechanism to transfer operating revenue to token holders.

Author: DynaMyniard

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Token Network (TN) are defined as a group of actors whose adoption of a Token Changer native token amplifies the economic utility of the token for all actors within the group. Depending on the purpose of the token, this group of actors can come in many configurations.

Author: DynaMyniard
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: That was just too complicated for me ... can you explain with an example for my better understanding?

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Haha sure.. Air Miles is an example of an off-chain artefact that has similarities to a Token Network. The early adoption of Air Miles by important group actors (airlines) increased the utility value of Air Miles (equivalent to a blockchain token) for another set of actors (consumers) within the group. The adoption of Air Miles by consumers once again increased the utility value of Air Miles for merchants outside the airline industry. Token network will be working in a similar fashion.

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: 1 Token Changer is not a whitepaper ICO, our platform is ninety percent complete and we have DApps running on the ethereum mainnet and testnets. 2 Token Changer uses revenue to buy back its token from the market. This token buy back scheme achieves two objectives. One, the purchased tokens funds our customer loyalty program in the long term. Two, the buy back returns value to token holders. 3  The apple store is a destination for mobile apps. Amazon and Alibaba are e-commerce destinations on the web. Token Changerâ€™s strategic intent is to become a one stop shop for distributed financial applications (DApps). 4 Token Changer DApps have a point and click interface. Processing steps for transactions are also kept to a minimum making transactions fast and stress free. 5  Within 90 days after our ICO, we are going to start launching DApps for minting, trading and transferring stable tokens (usd, euro, yen etc). These DApps is the implementation of what we call the convergence of money. The convergence of money represents a very big market opportunity and we have a five year plan to take advantage of our first mover position. 6 Token Changer is not a typical ICO- marketing a team and ideas. We have a proven team currently working on our launch DApps even before the ICO.

Author: RobertzSmith
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Without funding, the Token Changer team has demonstrated experience and competence. We have deployed a working platform. In september 2018, we will have added an oracle and alarm clock capability to complete the platform. An oracle will automate the input of data (like price feeds) into our blockchain server. An alarm clock sends scheduled alerts to the blockchain server.   The Token Changer platform will be completed soon. So, whatâ€™s next? Within 90 days after our ICO, Token Changer will start launching DApps that implements our idea about the convergence of money. The blockchain will change how we create, trade and transfer money. The total market for money creation (stable tokens) is all the money in the worldâ€Šâ€”â€Š$90 trillion. The daily volume for spot forex transactions is $1.6 trillion. Global money remittances was worth $575 billion in 2016. Convergence removes the current friction between these three activities. In the future, a user can mint a stable token pegged to the dollar using a Token Changer DApp. The user can trade the stable token for another stable token or cryptocurrency using a trading DApp. And if the user elects, can use a licensed financial institution DApp hosted on Token Changer to transfer the value of a stable token to a bank account.

Author: Alex_TokenChanger
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Our mission is to become the destination for financial dApps on the blockchain. What is means is that through the convergence of money (https://medium.com/tokenchanger/the-next-big-convergence-ba231a092c5e) users will be able to supply/mint fiat pegged tokens (USD, EUR, JPY...) to the trading platform, do money remittances (in conjunction with banking institutions) , and create trading/transfer tools for crypto investors as well as companies in crypto. Global fiat, thus all the money in the world is worth $90 trillion dollars. So once the convergence model in place you will need the value of ether to keep raising to keep pace with the demand for fiat pegged tokens. Imagine what that will do for the price of the Token Changer token and crypto as a whole.

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: The TOC is a market traded token of which 20% of the total mint is held in reserve to reward market makers on the Token Changer platform. Another 30% of the total mint is sold to during an initial coin offering (ICO). Because the TOC is market traded, that means its price moves up and down. We needed a non-tradable token to allocate rewards to market makers in a predictable way. And this is the purpose of Block Points. Block Points is a non-tradable, non-transferable native token which is given to platform users that play market making roles in DApps. Periodically, we will exchange TOC tokens for Block Points. This action will reduce the reserve of TOC tokens available to fund market maker rewards. To maintain the market maker reserve, we will use Ether revenue to buy TOC tokens from token holders at above market price. Token buyback ensures our customer loyalty program is sustainable and the buyback price acts as a mechanism to transfer operating revenue to token holders.

Author: cryptomaniac.
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: How business networks will help in sustainability?

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: A business network on the other hand is the use of one or more Token Changer DApps to create operational synergy between businesses. A business network might use a native token or it might not. The native token is not the driver, what drives the business network is the notion that linkages at the operational level between businesses in the network makes the whole greater than the sum of its parts. Some hypothetical business networks are described as follows. - Currency Union A select group of Bureau de Change operators around the world use a DApp hosted by Token Changer to offer cross border money transfer services to their customers. A capability none of them can develop on their own. - Trading Co-Operative A group of local food crop producers use a DApp hosted by Token Changer to sell forward some of their output to international buyers. By working together, they increase the output offered for sale which in turn makes the trading DApp attractive to big international buyers

Author: RobertzSmith
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Q1.Whats the Financial structure for this project?

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: The total amount of Token Changer tokens called the TOC to be ever minted is one billion tokens priced at 0.15 USD per TOC. One percent (1%) of this total is been offered in private placement deals. Two percent (2%) of this total is been offered in a presale and another twenty seven (27%) percent is been offered in the main sale.   Twenty percent (20%) of TOCs is set aside to fund our customer loyalty program. The workings of this fund called the Market Makers Reserve is described in our whitepaper. Token Changer DApps are accessible through web browsers. Currently, they are not as user friendly as we would like them to be. Thirty percent (30%) of ICO proceeds will be allocated to the engineering budget. A significant proportion of the engineering budget will be spent on DApp user interface design and development.

Author: Dialtopal
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: a. Early Bird : There is no start date for early bird sales. But it ends when the 1% hard cap is reached. Anyone can participate in the early bird sale. Check the ICO DApp to see, if the early bird sale is still live. The early bird discount is 40%. b. Presale :The presale discount (30%) is not as steep as the early bird (40%) and it ends when the main sale starts or the 2% hard cap is reached. c.Main Sale -The main sale starts when the countdown on our ICO page counts down to zero. During the main sale, the TOC price is pegged at 0.15 USD per TOC. The main sale ether price is frequently updated on the ICO DApp to reflect the 0.15 USD peg

Author: g.targaryen
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: because we cannot estimate the quantity of loyalty points (block points) users of the platform will earn, it is prudent not to assign any value to loyalty points.  when we want to distribute rewards we use the following formula to determine the exchange rate for loyalty points (block points)  TOC/BKP Exchange Rate =  Total Supply of Block Points (loyalty points)                                        ---------------------------------------------------                                                 TOC Available for Distribution   This exchange rate is inputted into the Reward Distribution DAPP, which will issue TOC to users that have block point balances.   You can off course elect not to exchange your block points at that rate and wait for the next distribution to see if the rate has improved

Author: Alex_TokenChanger
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: EtherDelta & Airswap are decentralized exchange that allow users to buy tokens from one another. Token Changer is a platform for financial dApps - fundamentally different. On the Token Changer platform anyone can create stable tokens pegged to fiat currencies. The platform offers a point and click interface for trading tokens INCLUDING stable tokens. For transfers, the platform implements DApps (decentralized financial applications) for licensed financial institutions. These DApps are used to move value in and out of the blockchain. The whole process of creating, trading and transferring money is seamless for the end user.

Author: btcltcdigger
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: Web | IcoBench | Airdrop | Blog | Whitepaper | ICO Paper | Telegram  INTRODUCTION  Token Changer is a multi-blockchain platform for distributed financial applications. We design, build and host a wide variety of financial DApps. From simple token trading DApps to complex applications.  WHY INVEST IN TOKEN CHANGER?   [1] Token Changer is not a whitepaper ICO, our platform is ninety percent complete and we have DApps running on the ethereum mainnet and testnets.  [2] Token Changer uses revenue to buy back its token from the market. This token buy back scheme achieves two objectives. One, the purchased tokens funds our customer loyalty program in the long term. Two, the buy back returns value to token holders.  [3] The Apple App store is a destination for mobile apps. Amazon and Alibaba are e-commerce destinations on the web. Token Changerâ€™s strategic intent is to become a one stop shop for distributed financial applications (DApps).  [4] Token Changer DApps have a point and click interface. Processing steps for transactions are also kept to a minimum making transactions fast and stress free.  [5] Within 90 days after our ICO, we are going to start launching DApps for minting, trading and transferring stable tokens (usd, euro, yen etc). These DApps are the implementation of what we call the convergence of money. The convergence of money represents a very big market opportunity and we have a five year plan to take advantage of our first mover position.    [6] Token Changer is not a typical ICO marketing a team and ideas. We have a proven team currently working on our launch DApps even before the ICO (stable token).  PLATFORM FEATURES  [1] Web browser interface for DApps [2] No login required [3] Secure and trustless blockchain software at the back-end [4] Multiple blockchains supported  ROADMAP   FINANCIAL STRUCTURE   TOKEN CHANGER TEAM (LINKEDIN)  Alexis Bizalion: co-founder George Ezechukwu : co-founder Luke Sherwood: community manager Mike Maurer: customer experience manager Rob Moya: front-end engineer Simon Cocking: adviser Hans Koning: adviser Alex Rutledge: adviser  MORE PROJECT CONTENT   - Token Changer ICO Paper  - Token Changer White Paper  - The Convergence of Money  - Minting Synthetic Tokens on the Blockchain for Profit

Author: g.targaryen
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: According to our roadmap, within 90 days after the ICO will be launching two dapps.  (1) Dollar Token Minting DApp (2) ETH/USD Trading DApp  What these two dapps will do, is to enable the trading of ETH/USD trading pair on the ethereum blockchain. This capability currently does not exist. Lets's look at some numbers.  The ETH/USD pair according to coinmarketcap has a daily trading volume of over $3bn. If we assume that 1% to 10% of this trade comes home (to the ethereum blockchain), we are looking at a daily turnover of between $3 to $30 million USD.  The way our customer loyalty program works is that users get a chuck of our commission. At 0.15% flat rate, the commission revenue for this particular dapp is estimated to be between $4,500 to $45,000 daily.  Here is a link to our green paper https://medium.com/tokenchanger/papers/home for minting stable tokens on the blockchain.

Author: poordeveloper
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services

Author: g.targaryen
Title: [ANN][ICO] ðŸš€ TOKEN CHANGER ðŸš€ LIVE âœ… Platform for Financial Products & Services
Body: my understanding of coinmarketcap ranking is that it has to do with market capitalization. our token (ticker TOC) is been priced at 0.15 cents at ICO. Our intent is to get to $1 within 24 months. We have to focus on execution and that should reflect on market price and ranking on coinmarketcap.  Right now we are not so much worried about competition since the market is so big (global financial services and products). ETH/USD is important, but it is just one of many. If we focus of speedy execution, we should be okay.
